name: Fallen Monuments
description:
Overview

Fallen Monuments is a 2D side-scroller where the player is confronted with destroying, keeping, or moving historic statues based on their controversial histories.  Approach 10 statues and decide their fates based in the stories behind them.  

How to Play

When approaching statues, choose whether to destroy them, move them to one of the purple museums, or to save them by erecting yellow tape around them. As a result, groups of BLM protesters or counter protesters will either attack you in anger, let you pass, or stop attacking you if they agree with your actions.

Controls

Move - ASD

Attack - Click Left Mouse Button

Keep Statues (When in radius) - E

Move Statues (When in radius) - Hold Right Mouse Button + Move
